transcript: Smoothie King where I used to work had really good milkshakes so they us hug and do ice cream and ice and they'd add sugar to it it was super good so the way it worked is you get one free Smoothie per shift but you could finish any extra smoothie honestly it made more sense to just finish them and have like a fourth of 20 of them I realized actually when I was there I gained weight I mean not a lot but like I was like oh I got to not do this
